body: This would start the process for packaging PowerShell on Linux.  It will be much cleaner and easier to use CMake in monad linux with add_custom_command and add_custom_target to run make in monad build and the bootstrap step. Set CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX to change location  defaults to  usr local . A small start exists in monad native on dev make install.  This should probably wait on powershell the native executable getting smarter behavior.  Where to place libraries canonically  http   tldp.org HOWTO Program Library HOWTO shared libraries.html  VSO create date - 10/27/2015 23:54:00
